info.title: AzureSphereManagementClient
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Azure Sphere in your Azure subscription

post.summary: Counts the devices that belong to a catalog.

200.description: Response to the action call for count devices in a catalog.

default.description: An Azure Sphere Error

post.summary: Retrieves a set of image identifiers with corresponding component identifiers.

200.description: Response to the action call for list of component identifiers for the given image identifiers.

default.description: An Azure Sphere Error

default.description: An Azure Sphere Error

default.description: An Azure Sphere Error

default.description: An Azure Sphere Error
